subject: p10523725
Findings: Frontal and lateral views of the chest. The lungs are clear of consolidation or effusion. Right pleural based thickening at the base laterally is again seen. There is no evidence of pulmonary vascular congestion. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is stable in. No acute osseous abnormality detected.
